Headline: 5. Arithmetic Commands & Operators
Name: signbit
Description: Sign bit (returns 1 if the number is negative, 0 otherwise).

Headline: 5. Arithmetic Commands & Operators
Name: sgn
Description: Signum function (returns -1 if the number is negative, 0 if it's zero, 1 if it's positive).

Headline: 5. Arithmetic Commands & Operators
Name: dec
Description: Decrements an expression by 1 (x := x â€“ 1).

Headline: 5. Arithmetic Commands & Operators
Name: exp
Description: Exponential function (returns the value of e^x).

Headline: 5. Arithmetic Commands & Operators
Name: pow
Description: Power function (returns the value of x^y).

Headline: 5. Arithmetic Commands & Operators
Name: sh_left
Description: Shifts the bits in <expression> by the amount of <shift-bits> to the left. Effectively multiplies the expression by 2.

Headline: 5. Arithmetic Commands & Operators
Name: sh_right
Description: Shifts the bits in <expression> by the amount of <shift-bits> to the right. Effectively divides the expression by 2.
